title: [1.5.1][ssp/smp] Walking Dead 行尸走肉
author: shijun
txt_content:
本帖最后由 shijun 于 2013-4-19 21:50 编辑 

这个mod可以使你的僵尸无时无刻无处不在（包括白天并且不会燃烧），僵尸会攻击玩家，鸡和猪。在配置文件中的选项来允许或禁止僵尸产卵（不知道改翻译成啥就还是用机翻吧），骷髅，jj怪，蜘蛛，史莱姆，和小黑。僵尸随机皮肤。



原文：==== Walking Dead ==== NEW! Improved spawning!
 Zombies in the daytime! Walkers are everywhere, be careful. Sort of an adventure mod. The walkers will attack players, chickens and pigs. There are options in the config file to allow or disallow spawning of zombies, skeletons, creepers, spiders, slime, and endermen. Now there are random textures for the
 walkers. The textures are from the awesome JohnSmith texture pack. I have also credited JohnSmith in the README in the mod jar file. The walkers should now be able to spawn in any biome derived from the BiomeGenBase class. Walkers should now spawn in biomes created by the ExtraBiomesXL mod, for instance.

 Since JohnSmith is MIA I am going by his post to use the images.


QuoteIf you want to use my textures in your pack:
You can use, edit and share my textures as long as I'm credited
You are not allowed to make money with my work
And you are not allowed to use my textures in a customizer or in any other games else than Minecraft.


 If any issues arise with the use of these textures I will remove them immediately.


 I recommend creating a world with these presets if you want a real walking dead apocalypse adventure.
2;7,56x1,5x3,2;6;biome_1,decoration,lake, lava_lake. This is a swamp world similar to Swampcore, only deeper. You can mine ore here. Using the WalkingDead defaults you will have to contend with many walkers and spiders. Want some bad weather to go along?
/weather thunder 100000 should do it. Oh, and watch out for the witch. With a little luck you can find a witches hut for shelter on you first night.
